Address.label: Address
Address.value: 220 ALHAMBRA CIRCLE, CORAL GABLES, Florida, 33134, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Amerant Bancorp Inc is a bank holding company. Through its bank, it provides individuals and businesses deposit, credit, investment, wealth management and fiduciary services, both in the United States and to select international customers. The bank also provides banking services through traditional channels, such as banking centers and ATMs, as well as via secure websites, mobile devices, and telephone.
